price: Ó sì fọ́ wọn sí wẹ́wẹ́ àfi àgbà (òrìṣà) wọn nítorí kí wọ́n lè padà dé bá a.
arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرٗا لَّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalahum judhādhan illā kabīran lahum laʿallahum ilayhi yarjiʿūna
